Content and Schedule
Thursday 18th November. 9.00-14.00
Section 3: Ontologies (theory: 2 hours, hands-on: 1 hour)
(Raúl García-Castro)
 Languages used in ontology implementation (RDF(S) and OWL) as well as 
query languages (SPARQL).
Section 3: Ontologies (theory: 2 hours)
(Raúl García-Castro)
 Tools used in building and storing ontologies (Sesame, Jena, Protégé, 
NeOn toolkit) as well as in ontology reasoning (Pellet, Racer).
